mapper.select: SELECT L.*, B.BRCH_ADDR, B.BRCH_TEL, B.BRCH_TRTH_NAME, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM T_LOST L, T_BRCH B, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE L.BRCH_NAME = B.BRCH_NAME ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC

SELECT L.*, B.BRCH_ADDR, B.BRCH_TEL, B.BRCH_TRTH_NAME, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM T_LOST L, T_BRCH B, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE L.BRCH_NAME = B.BRCH_NAME AND (L.BRCH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%') OR LOST_CAT LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%') OR LOST_ITEM LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%') OR LOST_LOC LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%') OR LOST_DATE LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%')) ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC

SELECT L.*, B.BRCH_ADDR, B.BRCH_TEL, B.BRCH_TRTH_NAME, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM T_LOST L, T_BRCH B, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE L.BRCH_NAME = B.BRCH_NAME AND L.BRCH_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%') ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC

SELECT L.*, B.BRCH_ADDR, B.BRCH_TEL, B.BRCH_TRTH_NAME, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM T_LOST L, T_BRCH B, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE L.BRCH_NAME = B.BRCH_NAME AND (LOST_CAT LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%') OR LOST_ITEM LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%')) ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC

SELECT L.*, B.BRCH_ADDR, B.BRCH_TEL, B.BRCH_TRTH_NAME, @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM + 1 AS ROWNUM FROM T_LOST L, T_BRCH B, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) R WHERE L.BRCH_NAME = B.BRCH_NAME AND LOST_LOC LIKE CONCAT('%', '${text}', '%') ORDER BY LOST_DATE DESC
